definition: to defeat/to damage/to lose (to an opponent)/to fail/to wither

sentences.english: No matter it is fully blooming or silently declining, willingness and respect we keep to it are always there.
sentences.chinese: 不管是竭力盛放，還是靜默頹敗，都如此甘願和珍重。

definition: to act in collusion (idiom); in cahoots with/villains will look after one another
lit. to return the jade annulus to Zhao (idiom); fig. to return something intact to its rightful owner
